pajekHeader.message:
You can open the graph in several programs like Gephi.
Graph in the Pajek format.
Select

gexfHeader.message:
Graph in the GEXF format (dynamic)
Select

firstLogin.message:
Hello,
Thank you for your interest in Visual History. Here are some tips for you.
Two pages are linked together if you consulted them consecutively in less time than 20 min.
Colors:
  1. currently opened webpages are in yellow;
  2. the other pages are in blue (oldest ones) or in green if they were consulted recently.

Do not forget to click Refresh in order to apply changes made on the toolbar.
You can too zoom in and out using your mouse wheel.

You can find some other options in the options page of the webapp.

Now you can play.
